news_header: Three buses exploded in Bat Yam, suspected terror attack; police search for suspects and more bombs.
news_original_title: Three buses explode in Israel in 'suspected terror attack', police say
news_text: In Bat Yam, south of Tel Aviv, three buses exploded in what Israeli police suspect is a terror attack. Two other devices failed to detonate. Transport Minister Miri Regev has halted all public transport for safety checks. Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu has ordered military operations against terrorist centers in the West Bank. Fortunately, there are no reported casualties so far. Footage shows at least one bus on fire, and police are actively searching for additional explosives. A 5kg unexploded device bore a message linked to a recent Israeli military operation. Netanyahu has also instructed police and security agencies to enhance preventive measures against further attacks. Transport Minister Regev is returning early from Morocco due to the incident.
